verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%>. The <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H2377>vision<s%> of <S%H5151>Nahum<s%> the <S%H512>Elkoshite<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is a <S%H7072>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> and <S%H5358>avengeth<s%>; <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5358>avengeth<s%> and is full of <S%H1167>wrath<s%>; <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> taketh <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> on his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>, and he <S%H5201>reserveth<s%> wrath for his <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%>, and <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H3581>power<s%>, and will by no <S%H5352>means<s%> <S%H5352>clear<s%> the <S%H3068>guilty<s%>: Jehovah hath his <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%> and in the <S%H8183>storm<s%>, and the <S%H6051>clouds<s%> are the <S%H80>dust<s%> of his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.

He <S%H1605>rebuketh<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and maketh it <S%H2717>dry<s%>, and drieth <S%H3001>up<s%> all the <S%H5104>rivers<s%>: <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> <S%H535>languisheth<s%>, and <S%H3760>Carmel<s%>; and the <S%H6525>flower<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> <S%H535>languisheth<s%>.

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7493>quake<s%> at <S%H1389>him<s%>, and the hills <S%H4127>melt<s%>; and the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H5375>upheaved<s%> at his <S%H6440>presence<s%>, <S%H8398>yea<s%>, the world, and all that dwell <S%H3427>therein<s%>.

Who can <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H2195>indignation<s%>? and who can <S%H6965>abide<s%> in the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger<s%>? his <S%H2534>wrath<s%> is poured <S%H5413>out<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%>, and the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> are broken asunder by <S%H5422>him<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>, a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>; and he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> them that take refuge in <S%H2620>him<s%>.

But with an <S%H5674>over-running<s%> <S%H7858>flood<s%> he will <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of her <S%H4725>place<s%>, and will <S%H7291>pursue<s%> his <S%H341>enemies<s%> into <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
What do ye <S%H2803>devise<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? he will <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end<s%>; <S%H6869>affliction<s%> shall not rise <S%H6965>up<s%> the second <S%H6471>time<s%>.

For <S%H5440>entangled<s%> like <S%H5518>thorns<s%>, and <S%H5433>drunken<s%> as with their <S%H5435>drink<s%>, they are <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H4392>utterly<s%> as <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H7179>stubble<s%>.
There is one gone forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H2803>thee<s%>, that deviseth <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that <S%H3289>counselleth<s%> <S%H1100>wickedness<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: Though they be in full <S%H8003>strength<s%>, and likewise <S%H7227>many<s%>, even so shall they be cut <S%H1494>down<s%>, and he shall pass <S%H5674>away<s%>. Though I have <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> <S%H6031>thee<s%>, I will afflict thee no more.
And now will I <S%H7665>break<s%> his <S%H4132>yoke<s%> from off <S%H5423>thee<s%>, and will burst thy <S%H4147>bonds<s%> in <S%H5423>sunder<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath given <S%H6680>commandment<s%> concerning <S%H8034>thee<s%>, that no more of thy name be <S%H2232>sown<s%>: out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H430>gods<s%> will I cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the graven <S%H6459>image<s%> and the molten <S%H4541>image<s%>; I will <S%H7760>make<s%> thy <S%H6913>grave<s%>; for thou art <S%H7043>vile<s%>.

Behold <S%H2022><s%>, upon the mountains the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of him that bringeth good <S%H1319>tidings<s%>, that <S%H8085>publisheth<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>! <S%H2287>Keep<s%> thy <S%H2282>feasts<s%>, O <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H7999>perform<s%> thy <S%H5088>vows<s%>; for the <S%H1100>wicked<s%> one shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> pass <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H3772>thee<s%>; he is utterly cut off.
